sentences.text: A MESSAGE TO OUR SHAREHOLDERS FROM PFIZERS LEAD INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Message from Pfizers Lead Independent Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Shareholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It has been my privilege to serve as Pfizers Lead Independent Director this year, working with a group of highly-engaged and knowledgeable Board members, strongly attuned to their roles as your fiduciaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As I embark on my third year as Lead Independent Director, I would like to reflect on 2016 and the many ways in which the Board worked together to provide independent oversight of management and to represent shareholder interests throughout the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Board Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: First and foremost, your Board is composed of fully independent Directors, with the exception of Ian C. Read, Pfizers Chairman and CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Directors skills reflect deep expertise and qualifications essential to effective oversight of the business, including business leadership, healthcare industry expertise and extensive experience in finance, science and risk management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board utilizes its deep knowledge and diverse backgrounds to work with management in its oversight of corporate strategy, which we discussed at nearly every Board meeting in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, we reviewed specific major business and organizational initiatives, capital allocation priorities and business development opportunities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, the Board and its Committees were involved in overseeing enterprise risk management, including risk priorities and developments that could impact the business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also discussed Board and management succession planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dennis A. Ausiello, M.D.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Board Leadership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Lead Independent Director, I work closely with our CEO to ensure that an active dialogue between our independent Directors and management exists.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I serve as a representative for our independent Directors and, in this capacity, contribute to the development of, and approval of Board meeting agendas, materials and schedules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At each Board meeting, I also preside over the executive sessions held with the independent Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, I am responsible for leading the independent Directors evaluation of the effectiveness of Pfizers Chairman and CEO, Mr. Read.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This assessment includes an annual evaluation of his performance in leading Pfizers business as our CEO, as well as his performance as Chairman through his interactions with the Directors and his ability to provide effective leadership and direction to the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards assessment of Mr. Read also informs the Boards comprehensive annual review of our leadership structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board strongly believes that Mr. Reads extensive knowledge of the research-based biopharmaceutical industry and his continued demonstration of exemplary leadership and vision, coupled with the active and engaged role that defines the Pfizer Lead Independent Director position, support our belief that, at this time, a unified Chairman and CEO role is the right leadership structure for Pfizer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and Committee Composition and Refreshment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the year, we also focused on Board and Committee composition and refreshment, two important topics to our investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We discussed these items regularly at meetings and considered projected Director retirement dates in combination with a review of skill sets and qualifications.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: it has the appropriate balance of skills, diversity, experience and tenure to provide effective oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Informed by this comprehensive review, as well as shareholder feedback we received, the Board recommended several Committee member rotations during 2016, including the appointment of new Chairs to lead the Audit, Compensation and Science and Technology Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2012, we have also welcomed four new Directors to the Board, including Ronald E. Blaylock in February 2017, which brings our average tenure of the Board to seven years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committed to Strong Corporate Governance Standards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the Boards ongoing commitment to act with integrity and to maintain high corporate governance standards, we continued to place a high priority on listening and responding to shareholder feedback regarding our corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considered the shareholder votes on the proxy items presented at last years Annual Meeting, which resulted in strong support for the re-election of the Director candidates, the companys auditor and our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One area of focus for the Board was the vote received on the lobbying activities shareholder proposal in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although the proposal did not pass, in response to the feedback the Board received through our extensive shareholder outreach effort, the Corporate Governance Committee further strengthened its oversight of the companys lobbying activities and priorities and amended its Charter to clarify this responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board remains committed to serving your interests in 2017 and appreciates your continued engagement and support of our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I invite you to review this Proxy Statement to learn more about your Board, Pfizers strong corporate governance practices and the proposals on this years proxy ballot.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dennis A. Ausiello, M.D. Lead Independent Director

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that a robust shareholder outreach program is an essential component of maintaining our strong corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In our discussions with investors, we seek their input on a variety of corporate governance topics and other issues that may impact our business or reputation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We strive for a collaborative approach with investors to solicit and understand a variety of perspectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, we engaged with over 30 global institutional investors representing nearly 30% of our outstanding shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Investors sentiment was generally positive with respect to our eadership, our corporate governance practices, the structure of our executive compensation plan and other issues specific to our industry.

sentences.text: This nformation was summarized and shared with the Board of Directors.

sentences.text: As a result, the Corporate Governance Committee maintains an informed status on the companys lobbying priorities and activities through semi-annual reports from management.

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pfizers pay-for-performance compensation philosophy is set by the Compensation Committee of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our goal is to align each executives compensation with Pfizers short-term and long-term performance and provide the compensation and incentives needed to attract, motivate and retain key executives crucial to Pfizers long-term success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To achieve these objectives:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We position total direct compensation and each compensation element at approximately the median of our pharmaceutical peer and general industry comparator companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We align annual short-term incentive awards with annual operating, financial and strategic objectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We align long-term incentive awards with the interests of our shareholders by delivering value based on operating results and absolute and relative shareholder return, encouraging stock ownership and promoting retention of key talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of the total compensation opportunity for our executives is directly related to Pfizers total shareholder return (TSR) and our progress against the performance goals of our strategic and operating plans, as well as our performance against that of our peers.

sentences.text: In recruiting and selecting Board candidates, the Corporate Governance Committee takes into account the size of the Board and considers a skills matrix.

sentences.text: Overview
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pfizer is committed to exercising strong corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that good governance promotes the long-term interests of our shareholders, strengthens Board and management accountability and improves our standing as a trusted member of society.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We maintain and enhance our long record of excellence in corporate governance by regularly refining our corporate governance policies and procedures to reflect evolving practices and issues raised by our shareholders and other stakeholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our governance structure and processes are guided by key governance documents, including our Corporate Governance Principles and Committee Charters, which govern the operation of the Board of Directors and its Committees in the execution of their responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Principles are reviewed at least annually by the Corporate Governance Committee and the full Board and are updated periodically in response to changing regulatory requirements, evolving practices, issues raised by our shareholders and other stakeholders, and otherwise as circumstances warrant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Principles are included as Annex 1 to this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Information

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board recognizes that one of its key responsibilities is to evaluate and determine its optimal leadership structure to provide independent oversight of senior management and a highly engaged and high-functioning Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on its experience, considerable engagement with shareholders, and an assessment of research on this issue, the Board understands that numerous viewpoints concerning a boards optimal leadership structure exist.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given the dynamic and competitive environment in which we operate, the Board believes that the right leadership structure may vary as circumstances warrant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our By-laws and Corporate Governance Principles, the Board can and will change its leadership structure if it determines that doing so is appropriate and in the best interest of Pfizer and its shareholders at any given time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with this understanding, the independent Directors do not view any particular Board leadership structure as preferred and consider the Boards leadership structure on at least an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This consideration includes the evaluation of alternative leadership structures in light of the companys current operating and governance environment, a review of empirical data on the topic, and investor feedback, with the goal of achieving the optimal model for Board leadership and effective oversight of senior leaders by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Role of the Lead Independent Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The position of Lead Independent Director at Pfizer has a clear mandate, significant authority and well-defined responsibilities under a Board- approved Charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These responsibilities and authority include the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: presiding at executive sessions of the independent Directors and at other Board meetings at which the Chairman and CEO is not present;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approving information sent to the Board, including the quality, quantity and timeliness of such information;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: contributing to the development of and approving meeting agendas;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serving as an ex-officio member of each Committee and attending meetings of the various Committees regularly;  calling meetings of the independent Directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: facilitating the Boards approval of the number and frequency of Board meetings and approving meeting schedules to ensure that there is sufficient time for discussion of all agenda items;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: leading the evaluation by the independent Directors of the CEOs effectiveness as the Chairman and CEO, including an annual evaluation of his interactions with the Directors and ability to provide leadership and direction to the full Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: authorizing the retention of outside advisors and consultants who report directly to the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: being regularly apprised of inquiries from shareholders and involved in correspondence responding to these inquiries when appropriate; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serving as liaison between the independent Directors and the Chairman and CEO;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if requested by shareholders or other stakeholders, ensuring that he is available, when appropriate, for consultation and direct communication.

sentences.text: The Boards Role in Risk Oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for assessing and managing risk, including through the Enterprise Risk Management (ERM) program, subject to oversigh by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ERM program provides a framework for risk identification and management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each risk is assigned to a member or members, as appropriate, of our Executive Leadership Team (ELT)the heads of our principal businesses and corporate functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that its eadership structure and the ERM program support the risk oversight function of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board executes its oversight responsibility for risk assessment and risk management directly and through its Committees:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considers specific risk topics, including risks associated with our strategic plan, our capital structure and our R&D activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board receives regular reports from members of our ELT that include discussions of the risks involved in their respective areas of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is routinely informed of developments that could affect our risk profile or other aspects of our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is kept informed of its Committees risk oversight and other activities through reports of the Committee Chairs to the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These reports are presented at every regular Board meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has primary responsibility for overseeing Pfizers ERM program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pfizers Chief Internal Auditor, who reports to the Committee, facilitates the ERM program in coordination with the Legal Division and Compliance Division and helps ensure that ERM is integrated into our strategic and operating planning process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees meeting agendas throughout the year include discussions of individual risk areas, as well as an annual summary of the ERM process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Corporate Governance Science and Technology
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Regulatory and Compliance Committee is responsible for reviewing and overseeing Pfizers compliance program, including but not limited to evaluating its effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They receive information about current and emerging risks and regulatory and enforcement trends that may affect our business operations, performance, or strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has primary responsibility for overseeing and reviewing significant risks associated with Pfizers healthcare law compliance programs and the status of compliance with applicable laws, regulations and internal procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards other Committees oversee risks associated with their respective areas of responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, the Compensation Committee considers the risks associated with our compensation policies and practices for both executive compensation and compensation generally.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also reviews and receives regular briefings concerning Pfizers information security and technology risks (including cybersecurity), including discussions of the companys information security and risk management programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pfizers Chief Information Officer leads our cybersecurity risk management program, which is fully integrated into the overall ERM program and overseen by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From time to time, the Regulatory and Compliance Committee and the Audit Committee hold joint sessions to discuss risks relevant to both Committees areas of risk oversight.

sentences.text: MANAGEMENT SUCCESSION PLANNING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Succession planning for Pfizers senior management positions to help ensure continuity of leadership over the long-term is critical to the companys success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is responsible for planning for succession to the position of Chief Executive Officer, as well as certain other senior management positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The topic is discussed regularly in executive sessions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assist the Board, the Chief Executive Officer annually provides the Board with an assessment of other senior managers and their potential to succeed him.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chief Executive Officer also provides the Board with an assessment of persons considered potential successors to certain senior management positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Corporate Governance Committee will review periodically with the Chief Executive Officer the succession plans relating to positions held by elected corporate officers and will make recommendations to the Board with respect to the selection of individuals to hold these positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: BOARD SUCCESSION PLANNING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee focuses on Board succession planning on a continuous basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In performing this function, the Committee is responsible for recruiting and recommending nominees for election as Directors to the full Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The goal is to achieve a Board that provides effective oversight of the company through the appropriate balance of diversity of perspectives, experience, expertise, skills, specialized knowledge and other qualifications and attributes of the individual Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards Role in Evaluating Its Effectiveness
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and each Committee conduct a rigorous annual self-evaluation of their performance and effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee oversees the process, which is conducted in the early part of the calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the evaluation, the Committee assesses several factors, including Director independence and qualifications to serve on various Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committee Chair assignments and membership rotations are also considered, which, in 2016, resulted in changes to the composition of certain Board Committees (see Committee Refreshment below).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also reviews the overall evaluation process, including whether to also incorporate individual Director evaluations into the process or conduct the evaluation through an external third-party provider and, in 2016, the Committee determined to maintain the evaluation process in its current form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results of the evaluation are presented, in executive session, at a subsequent Board meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results of each Committee evaluation are presented at subsequent Committee meetings for the relevant Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any results requiring additional consideration are addressed at future Board and Committee meetings, as appropriate.

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee seeks to maintain and enhance Pfizers record of excellence in corporate governance by continually refining Pfizers corporate governance policies, procedures and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following are examples of how we worked to achieve these objectives in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and Committee Matters; Director Evaluations: During 2016, we assessed Director qualifications for serving on various committees and ecommended changes to the composition of certain committees, including certain committee Chairs; assessed Director independence; conducted a comprehensive self-evaluation process for the Board and its Committees; evaluated whether to use a third-party provider to conduct all or a portion of he evaluation process; reviewed and, where appropriate, recommended changes to our governing documents, including certain Committee Charters; and continued to review the functioning of the Board and Committees in developing areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure: We conducted a thorough annual review of the Boards leadership structure and recommended to the independent Directors that they retain the current leadership structure consisting of a combined Chairman and CEO and a Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recruitment and Assessment of Potential New Directors: In 2016, we continued an ongoing Board succession planning process to assess candidates for election as Directors, based upon a skills matrix and other criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Resulting from this process, in February 2017, the Committee ecommended and the Board elected Mr. Ronald E. Blaylock as a Director and a member of the Corporate Governance and Science and Technology Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other qualifications, Mr. Blaylock brings financial expertise, as well as risk management and business leadership skills to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee considered the election of Mr. Blaylock as a Director upon recommendation by our Chairman and CEO and evaluation by a hird-party search firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also reviewed outside requests to join the Board, as well as suggestions presented by external advisors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Social Responsibility: Under our Charter, the Committee maintains an informed status on company issues related to corporate social responsibility, sustainability and philanthropy, and monitors emerging issues potentially affecting the reputation of the pharmaceutical industry and Pfizer specifically.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee received an update on Pfizers corporate social responsibility initiatives at year-end.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Public Policy and Corporate Political Spending: Under our Charter, the Committee is also responsible for maintaining an informed status on company issues related to public policy, including political spending practices, we were informed of Pfizers public policy and corporate political spending practices through periodic discussions and reviews of the companys semi-annual Political Action Committee and Corporate Political Contributions Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lobbying Activities: In 2016, as a result of investor feedback on the companys lobbying activities and Pfizers commitment to corporate governance excellence, the Committee further strengthened its oversight of the companys lobbying priorities and activities and amended the Committees Charter to clarify this responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, the Committee maintains an informed status on the companys lobbying priorities and activities through semi- annual reports from management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Legislative and Regulatory Developments: We continued to monitor and evaluate corporate governance and executive compensation developments and best practices, including U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) rules and NYSE listing standards.

sentences.text: Leadership Planning: During 2016, the Committee reviewed long-term and emergency succession scenarios for Pfizers management.

sentences.text: RELATED PERSON TRANSACTION APPROVAL POLICY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pfizer has adopted a Related Person Transaction Approval Policy (the Policy) that is administered by the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Policy applies to any transaction or series of transactions in which Pfizer or a subsidiary is a participant, the amount involved exceeds $120,000, and a related person under the Policy has a direct or indirect material interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Policy, management determines whether a transaction requires review by the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Transactions requiring review are referred to the Corporate Governance Committee for approval, ratification or other action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on its consideration of all of the relevant facts and circumstances, the Corporate Governance Committee decides whether or not to approve such transactions and approves only those transactions that are deemed to be in the best interests of the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the company becomes aware of an existing transaction with a related person that has not been approved under this Policy, the matter is referred to the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee evaluates all options available, including ratification, revision or termination of such transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee then provides a summary of such transactions, including their terms, structure and business purpose, as well as the Corporate Governance Committees approval decision, to the Audit Committee for their information.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of Pfizers independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee conducts a comprehensive annual evaluation of the independent registered public accounting firms qualifications, performance and independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee considers whether the independent registered public accounting firm should be rotated and considers the advisability and potential impact of selecting a different independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In evaluating and selecting the companys independent registered public accounting firm, the Audit Committee considers, among other things, historical and recent performance of the current independent audit firm, an analysis of known significant legal or regulatory proceedings related to the firm, external data on audit quality and performance, including recent Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) reports, industry experience, audit fee revenues, firm capabilities and audit approach, and the independence and tenure of the audit firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee selected, and the Board of Directors ratified the selection of, KPMG LLP (KPMG) to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pfizers auditors have been KPMG and its predecessor firm, Peat, Marwick, Mitchell & Co., since 1987.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that, Pfizer auditors were Main Hurdman (until its acquisition by Peat, Marwick, Mitchell & Co. in 1987) and its predecessors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with SEC rules and KPMG policies, audit partners are subject to rotation requirements to limit the number of consecutive years an individual partner may provide audit service to our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For lead and concurring review audit partners, the maximum number of consecutive years of service in that capacity is five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The process for selection of the lead audit partner under this rotation policy involves a meeting between the Chair of the Audit Committee and the candidate for the role, as well as discussion by the full Committee and with management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board of Directors believe that the continued retention of KPMG as our independent registered public accounting firm is in the best interest of Pfizer and our shareholders, and we are asking our shareholders to ratify the selection of KPMG as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although ratification is not required by our By-laws or otherwise, the Board is submitting the selection of KPMG to our shareholders for ratification because we value our shareholders views on Pfizers independent registered public accounting firm and as a matter of good corporate practice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event that our shareholders fail to ratify the selection, it will be considered a recommendation to the Board of Directors and the Audit Committee to consider the selection of a different firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if the selection is ratified, the Audit Committee may in its discretion select a different independent registered public accounting firm at any time during the year if it determines that such a change would be in the best interests of Pfizer and our shareholders.

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviews Pfizers financial reporting process on behalf of the Board of Directors.

sentences.text: Item 3  2017 Advisory Approval of Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee believes that Pfizers executive compensation program is consistent with the goals of our executive compensation philosophy and that it drives performance, encourages an appropriate sensitivity to risk and increases shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This pay-for-performance philosophy is set by the Compensation Committee and is intended to align each executives compensation with Pfizers short-term and long-term performance and to provide the compensation and incentives needed to attract, motivate and retain high-caliber executives who are crucial to Pfizers long-term success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A significant portion of the total compensation opportunity for each of our executives directly relates to Pfizers total shareholder return and to other performance factors that measure our progress against the goals of our strategic and operating plans, as well as our pay levels compared with those of our pharmaceutical peer group and general industry comparators.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making such comparisons, we consider company market capitalization and complexity as indicated by revenues, range of products, international operations and other factors because we use such factors in setting target levels of compensation and determining the value and levels of award opportunities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We implement our pay-for-performance philosophy and achieve our program goals by following three key principles:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: positioning total direct compensation and each compensation element at approximately the median of our peer and general industry comparator companies, with consideration of relative company market capitalization and complexity;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: aligning annual incentive awards with annual operating, financial and strategic objectives; an
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: rewarding absolute and relative performance in total shareholder return through long-term equity incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Results of 2016 Advisory Vote on Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pfizers executive compensation program received substantial shareholder support and was approved, on an advisory basis, by 94.4% of the votes cast at the 2016 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee and the other members of our Board believe that this level of approval of our executive compensation program is indicative of our shareholders strong support of our compensation philosophy and goals and the decisions made by the Compensation Committee in 2015 and early 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also believe that the consistent high level of support from our shareholders for our executive compensation program over the past several years is a result of our Compensation Committees commitment to compensating our executives in a manner that provides a strong link between pay and performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe it is also reflective of our philosophy and goals, market best practices and strong shareholder engagement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Pay for Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 marked a year of strong financial performance, positive strategic business development activity, an expansion of product access and pipeline advancement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee believes that the compensation of our Named Executive Officers for 2016 is reasonable and appropriate, is aligned with the performance of our company and is working to ensure that our managements interests align with increasing shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In deciding how to cast your vote on this proposal, the Board requests that you consider the structure of Pfizers executive compensation program in connection with our 2016 performance, which is more fully discussed in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, we discuss how we set compensation targets and other objectives and evaluate performance against those targets and objectives to ensure that performance is appropriately rewarded.

sentences.text: Stock Ownership and Holding Requirements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our NEOs are subject to stock ownership and holding requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CEO is required to own Pfizer common stock equal in value to at least six times his annual salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the other NEOs is required to own Pfizer common stock equal in value to at least four times their annual salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of these requirements, ownership includes not only shares owned directly by the NEO, but also shares and certain units held through various Pfizer plans and programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have also established milestone guidelines that we use to monitor progress toward meeting these targets over a five-year period, at the end of which the executive is expected to have reached the applicable ownership level.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Until an NEO reaches the applicable milestone, he must hold and may not sell any shares (except to meet tax withholding obligations).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once the ownership level is met, NEOs must hold and may not sell shares if doing so would cause ownership to fall below that level.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of December 31, 2016, Mr. Read owned Pfizer common stock and units equal in value to approximately 16 times his salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that these holding requirements align the interests of our NEOs with those of our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, certain long-term incentive awards continue to vest and settle in accordance with their stated terms following an NEOs retirement rather than vesting upon retirement, maintaining the alignment with shareholders into retirement.

sentences.text: WHEREAS, PFIZER has operations in Palestine/Israel;

sentences.text: These are:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Adhere to equal and fair employment practices in hiring, compensation, training, professional education, advancement and governance without discrimination based on national, racial, ethnic or religious identity.

sentences.text: 2. Identify underrepresented employee groups and initiate active recruitment efforts to increase the number of underrepresented employees.

sentences.text: 3. Develop training programs that will prepare substantial numbers of current minority employees for skilled jobs, including the expansion of existing programs and the creation of new programs to train, upgrade, and improve the skills of minority employees.

sentences.text: 4. Maintain a work environment that is respectful of all national, racial, ethnic and religious groups.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. Ensure that layoff, recall and termination procedures do not favor a particular national, racial, ethnic or religious group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. Not make military service a precondition or qualification for employment for any position, other than those positions that specifically require such experience, for the fulfillment of an employees particular responsibilities.

sentences.text: SUPPORTING STATEMENT:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The role of the CEO and management is to run the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The role of the Board of Directors is to provide independent oversight of management and the CEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There is a potential conflict of interest for a CEO to be her/his own overseer as Chair while managing the busi
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pfizers CEO Ian Read serves both as CEO and Chair of the Companys Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe the combination of these two roles in a single person weakens a corporations governance structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Andrew Grove, Intels former chair, stated, The separation of the two jobs goes to the heart of the conception of a corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Is a company a sandbox for the CEO, or is the CEO an employee?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If hes an employee, he needs a boss, and that boss is the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman runs the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can the CEO be his own boss?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In our view, shareholders are best served by an independent Board Chair who can provide a balance of power between the CEO and the Board empowering strong Board leadership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The primary duty of a Board of Directors is to oversee the management of a company on behalf of shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A combined CEO / Chair creates a potential conflict of interest, resulting in excessive management influence on the Board and weaker oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Numerous institutional investors recommend separation of these two roles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, Californias Retirement System CalPERS Principles & Guidelines encourage separation, even with a lead director in place.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: According to ISS 2015 Board Practices, (April 2015), 53% of S&P 1,500 firms separate these two positions and the number of companies separating these roles is growing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Chairing and overseeing the Board is a time intensive responsibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A separate Chair also frees the CEO to manage the company and build effective business strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Many companies have separate and/or independent Chairs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An independent Chair is an increasing trend in the U.S. and prevailing practice in the United Kingdom.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder resolutions urging separation of CEO and Chair received approximately 33% in 2015 and 31% in 2016, an indication of strong investor support.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To simplify the transition, this policy would be phased in and implemented when the next CEO is chosen.

sentences.text: Role and Composition of the Board of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. General.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors (the Board), which is elected by the shareholders, is the ultimate decision-making body of Pfizer Inc. (the Company), except with respect to those matters reserved to the shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It selects the Chief Executive Officer and other members of the senior management team, which is charged with the conduct of the Companys business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Having selected the senior management team, the Board acts as an advisor and counselor to senior management and ultimately monitors its performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The function of the Board to monitor the performance of senior management is facilitated by the presence of non-employee Directors of stature who have substantive knowledge of the Companys business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Succession Planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is responsible for planning for succession to the position of Chief Executive Officer as well as certain other senior management positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assist the Board, the Chief Executive Officer shall annually provide the Board with an assessment of other senior managers and their potential to succeed him or her.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He or she shall also provide the Board with an assessment of persons considered potential successors to certain senior management positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Board Leadership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent Directors will annually elect a Chairman of the Board, who may or may not be the Chief Executive Officer of the Company, based on the recommendation of the Corporate Governance Committee as a result of its annual review of the Companys Board leadership structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the individual elected as Chairman of the Board is the Chief Executive Officer, the independent Directors shall also elect a Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Chairman of the Board shall preside at all meetings of the shareholders and of the Board as a whole, as well as over executive sessions of the independent Directors, and shall perform such other duties, and exercise such powers, as from time to time shall be prescribed in the Companys By-laws or by the Board; provided that the Lead Independent Director, if any, shall preside over executive sessions of the Companys independent Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Lead Independent Director, if any, shall facilitate information flow and communication among the Directors and perform such other duties as may be specified by the Board and outlined in the Charter of the Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board shall consider the rotation of the Lead Independent Director, if any, at such intervals as the Board determines on the recommendation of the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Director Independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the policy of the Company that the Board consist of a majority of independent Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee of the Board has established Director Qualification Standards to assist it in determining Director independence, which either meet or exceed the independence requirements of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) corporate governance listing standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will consider all relevant facts and circumstances in making an independence determination, and not merely from the standpoint of the Director, but also from that of persons or organizations with which the Director has an affiliation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. Board Size.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the policy of the Company that the number of Directors not exceed a number that can function efficiently as a body.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee shall periodically consider and make recommendations to the Board concerning the appropriate size and needs of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee considers candidates to fill new positions created by increases in the size of the Board and vacancies that occur by resignation, by retirement or for any other reason.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. Selection Criteria.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be considered for membership on the Board, candidates should be individuals of proven integrity with a record of substantial achievement in an area of relevance to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In selecting Directors, the Board will generally seek leaders of major complex organizations, including within the scientific, government service, educational, finance, marketing, technology and the not-for-profit sectors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board also will seek some Directors who are widely recognized as leaders in the fields of medicine or the biological sciences.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates must have demonstrated ability and sound judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A candidate must also possess a judicious and critical temperament that will enable objective appraisal of managements plans and programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Director is expected to serve the best interests of all shareholders and must be committed to enhancing long-term Company growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the Companys By-laws, unless the Secretary of the Company determines that the number of nominees exceeds the number of Directors to be elected as of the record date for any meeting of the shareholders, a nominee must receive more votes cast for than against his or her election or re-election in order to be elected or re-elected to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board expects a Director to tender his or her resignation if he or she fails to receive the required number of votes for re-election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board shall nominate for election or re-election as Director only candidates who agree to tender, promptly following such persons failure to receive the required vote for election or re-election at the next shareholder meeting at which such person would face election or re-election, an irrevocable resignation that will be effective upon Board acceptance of such resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board shall fill Director vacancies and new directorships only with candidates who agree to tender, promptly following their appointment to the Board, the same form of resignation tendered by other Directors in accordance with this Corporate Governance Principle.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If an incumbent Director fails to receive the required vote for re-election, then, within 90 days following certification of the shareholder vote, the Corporate Governance Committee will act to determine whether to accept the Directors resignation and will submit such recommendation for prompt consideration by the Board, and the Board will act on the Committees recommendation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance Committee and the Board may consider any factors they deem relevant in deciding whether to accept a Directors resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any Director who tenders his or her resignation pursuant to this provision shall not participate in the Corporate Governance Committee recommendation or Board action regarding whether to accept the resignation offer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thereafter, the Board will promptly disclose its decision-making process and decision regarding whether to accept the Directors resignation offer (or the reason(s) for rejecting the resignation offer, if applicable) in a Current Report on Form 8-K (or any successor report) furnished to the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If each member of the Corporate Governance Committee fails to receive the required vote in favor of his or her election in the same election, then those independent Directors who did receive the required vote shall appoint a committee amongst themselves to consider the resignation offers and recommend to the Board whether to accept them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if the only Directors who receive the required vote in the same election constitute three or fewer Directors, all Directors may participate in the action regarding whether to accept the resignation offers.

sentences.text: 16. Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is the general policy of the Company that all major decisions be considered by the Board as a whole.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a consequence, the Committee structure of the Board is limited to those Committees considered to be basic to, or required or appropriate for, the operation of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently these Committees are the Executive Committee, Audit Committee, Compensation Committee, Corporate Governance Committee Regulatory and Compliance Committee and Science and Technology Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The members and chairs of these Committees are recommended to the Board by the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee, Compensation Committee and Corporate Governance Committee are made up of only independent Directors, as defined under the NYSE listing standards and all applicable laws and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to the requirement that a majority of the Board satisfy the independence standards noted above in Paragraph 4, Director Independence, members of the Audit Committee also must satisfy an additional NYSE independence standard.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, they may not accept directly or indirectly any consulting, advisory or other compensatory fee from the Company or any of its subsidiaries other than their Director compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a matter of policy, the Board also will apply a separate and heightened independence standard to members of both the Compensation and Corporate Governance Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No member of either Committee may be a partner, member or principal of a law firm, accounting firm or investment banking firm that accepts consulting or advisory fees from the Company or any of its subsidiaries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also will apply any heightened independence standards applicable to members of those Committees pursuant to NYSE requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board shall consider the rotation of committee assignments and of committee Chairs at such intervals as the Board determines on the ecommendation of the Corporate Governance Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consideration of rotation shall seek to balance the benefits derived from continuity and experience, on the one hand, and the benefits derived from gaining fresh perspectives and enhancing Directors understanding of different aspects o he Companys business and enabling functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In furtherance of its policy of having major decisions made by the Board as a whole, the Company has a full orientation and continuing education process for Board members that includes extensive materials, meetings with key management and visits to Company facilities.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee is responsible for setting annual and long- term performance goals for the Chief Executive Officer and for evaluating his or her performance against such goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee meets annually with the Chief Executive Officer to receive his or her recommendations concerning such goals.

sentences.text: Policy on Poison Pills
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 31. Expiration of Rights Agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board amended Pfizers Rights Agreement, or Poison Pill, to cause the Agreement to expire on December 31, 2003.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The term Poison Pill refers to a type of shareholder rights plan that some companies adopt to provide an opportunity for negotiation during a hostile takeover attempt.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted a statement of policy that it shall seek and obtain shareholder approval before adopting a Poison Pill; provided, however, that the Board may determine to act on its own to adopt a Poison Pill, if, under the circumstances, the Board, including the majority of the independent members of the Board, in its exercise of its fiduciary responsibilities, deems it to be in the best interest of Pfizers shareholders to adopt a Poison Pill without the delay in adoption that would come from the time reasonably anticipated to seek shareholder approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the Board were ever to adopt a Poison Pill without prior shareholder approval, the Board would either submit the Poison Pill to shareholders for ratification, or would cause the Poison Pill to expire within one year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
